data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Abies amabilis (Pacific silver fir) from sample HURRI-111

Exposition W, Slope 8 deg, Geology: Anstehender Silikat Schiefer, Tree line 1700 m, av. Tree height 18 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 20%, Herb cover 90%, Moss cover 5%, Vegatation type: Lock. plentr. Bestand mit allen Altersst. , Film number: 712A
